## Description 

This session will cover a basic introduction to Visual Studio Code (VS Code). VS Code is a visual code editor that streamlines brings together functionalities of many different coding tools, including programming languages, like R, technical publishing systems, like Quarto, and command line interfacing. 

VS Code is the most widely used code editor amongst developers worldwide and can be very helpful for getting started with developing version controlled computational projects. 

## Download and install VS Code 

Follow [these instructions](https://code.visualstudio.com/download) to download VS Code for your machine.
